entry.title: Holoseat - Bug #277 (In Progress): App window renders below full resolution on high resolution sc...
entry.content: This is the result of a bug/feature request in PyWebView (Issue 87). At last review, the PyWebView developer was looking for help for this issue.

entry.title: Perpetum mobile - Feature #271 (New): Preštudiraj teorijo
entry.content: Katera energija je najbolj verjetno kandidat za izkoriščanje za doseganje cilja?

entry.title: Mach 30 Technical Roadmap - Support #269 (New): Add brief description to launch vehicle sub-syste...
entry.content: For each sub-system listed in Choosing the technology branch for the v 1.0 roadmap, please post a brief description of the sub-system's purpose, related scientific principles, and examples from real systems. The focus of these descriptions should be to introduce them to volunteers without a specific aerospace background.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #267 (New): Add Companies Plugin
entry.content:
It would be nice to have the companies plugin (with additional features for users to register their own companies directly) so orgs like Mach 30 could group their projects together.

https://github.com/splendeo/chiliproject_companies

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #266 (New): Upgrade fundraising plugin to include more sites
entry.content: We should definitely add Indiegogo. There are probably others that I can't think of right now, so the first step should be to find a good list of popular fundraising and payment sites for individuals and small groups, then make the new master list of supported sites.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #265 (New): SCM URL in project settings is incorrect
entry.content: The URL shows the URL to the file system, instead of the URL users access the repository at.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #264 (New): New Project Creation Does Not Require Selection of Software ...
entry.content: If you select the hardware license, but not other licenses, the project is still created. I think it should at least stop you if you haven't selected a documentation license.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #263 (New): ThingTracker Integration
entry.content:
This is a feature request based on a conversation on project discoverability on the forums.

https://opendesignengine.net/boards/3/topics/790?r=794#message-794

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #260 (New): For Pay Private Projects
entry.content:
• Integration with payment processing (as another feature)
  • Turning private projects into a “sellable feature” (aka restrict number of users in private projects, tiers of private projects, etc)
  • Test that the projects are well and truly private
  • Preferably have all of this automated in terms of selling the feature (user clicks buy, server turns collects money, server turns on feature, feature gets turned off if money stops coming in, user can cancel, etc)

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #250 (New): Bread Crumb Navigation
entry.content: I know we talked about this at one time, and it just hit me (again) how useful this would be as I've been testing the new version. Where did this feature end up?

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Milestone #217 (New): Migrate ODE source code to match current version of Re...
entry.content: It has been too long since we did this migration. Be sure to document process in the ODE wiki so we can keep current from now on.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #184 (New): Add STL part editor using OpenJsCad
entry.content: Provides a Google Docs like functionality for editing 3D parts direct on ODE. See OpenJsCad.

entry.title: Shepard Test Stand - Bug #157 (Feedback): Time Stamp Bit Size Wrong On Arduino and Client
entry.content:
On the client side (laptop) we have been reading the time stamp (via the millis function) as a signed integer. According to the documentation, we should be treating that value as an unsigned long, giving us up to 50 days before it rolls over.

http://arduino.cc/en/Reference/millis

To do this we'll have to account for the fact that a long on the Arduino is 32 bits. Currently we're only sending 16 bits over the wire to the client. Sending 32 bits will slow the data rate down slightly, but I'm not sure yet by how much.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #150 (New): Install and begin usage of Redmine CMS Plugin
entry.content: The plugin (http://www.redmine.org/plugins/cms) may be very useful for adding additional information that would require writing a custom plugin at the moment in a much easier manner.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #123 (Feedback): Address inconsistent use of http and https in fundraisi...
entry.content: Some of the widgets that the fundraising plugin supports try to use dynamic calls to determine if they should use http vs https for the protocol when including content from third party sites on ODE. Other widgets use the string "https". We need to use a consistent (and working) implementation for including content from third party sites.
